org.judal.storage.table

Interface TableDataSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, DataSource
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RelationalDataSource

    public interface TableDataSource
extends DataSource
    Interface for DataSource implementations that support tables
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten

      • openTable

        Table openTable(Record recordInstance)
         throws javax.jdo.JDOException
        Open Table for Read/Write. Basic tables only support seeking records by primary key.
        Parameters:
        recordInstance - Record Instance of the Record subclass that will be used to read/write the Table
        Returns:

      • openView

        View openView(Record recordInstance)
       throws javax.jdo.JDOException

        View

                       throws javax.jdo.JDOException
        Open Indexed View for Read-Only. Indexed views support secondary indexes for seeking records.
        Parameters:
        recordInstance - Instance of the Record subclass that will be used to read the View
        Returns:
        IndexableView
        Throws:
        javax.jdo.JDOException

      • openJoinView

        IndexableView openJoinView(JoinType joinType,
                           Record result,
                           NameAlias baseTable,
                           NameAlias joinedTable,
                           com.knowgate.tuples.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>... onColumns)
                    throws javax.jdo.JDOException
        Open Indexed View for Read-Only of two joined views.
        Parameters:
        joinType - JoinType enum INNER, LEFTOUTER, RIGHTOUTER, FULL
        result - Record subclass that will be used to read the joined pair
        baseTable - NameAlias Base table name and alias
        joinedTable - NameAlias Joined table name and alias
        onColumns - Pair<String,String> Variable number of columns to do the join
        Returns:
        IndexableView
        Throws:
        javax.jdo.JDOException
